summary: Folio is building a first-of-its-kind AI-driven marketplace connecting hotels and restaurants with their suppliers, modernizing the $400B hotel procurement industry with AI search, web automations, invoice processing, and payment infrastructure.

Sentinel Defense Technologies is building the world's first AI-powered civilian protection platform that provides military-grade threat intelligence to non-combatants in conflict zones. The platform enables life-saving decisions during the critical first 72 hours of a crisis in areas like Ukraine and the Middle East.

Kyber is an open-source SDK and platform for controlling remote machines in extremely low latency, from remote desktop to robot teleoperation. The platform is a multi-stream and multi-actuator transport over Quic, developed by engineers from the VLC and FFmpeg community.

Upway is the leading marketplace for refurbished e-bikes across Europe and the United States, building the biggest second-hand bike shop in the world. They operate warehouses, handle real inventory, and build software that connects logistics, product, and marketplace dynamics at scale, having grown from 0 to $200M GMV in 3 years.

Sequent Tech builds cryptographically secure online voting infrastructure that has been used in over 200 real elections across multiple countries. They develop an open-source platform featuring end-to-end encrypted voting, cryptographic mixnets, and tamper-evident logging.

Modal builds a serverless cloud platform used by popular AI companies for inference, training, batch operations, and sandboxes. They provide observability tooling and infrastructure that serves as the primary cloud platform for many of their customers.

AppFolio (NASDAQ: APPF) is a proptech company focused on real estate technology solutions. The Platform Communications team is responsible for scaling SMS, email, in-app chat and voice communication offerings.

A small boutique consulting firm that provides custom software development and consulting services for small to medium-sized businesses. They are currently seeking someone with specific experience in CloudSuite Distribution by Infor ERP system for a client project.

Matterworks.ai builds AI tools to extract insights from biological data and unlock opportunities in therapeutic discovery, development, and manufacturing. They develop large-scale deep learning models to predict the phenotype and behavior of biological systems.

SightlineOS is building an AI-native supply chain operating system for restaurant chains, using modern data and ML systems to automate planning, inventory management, and spend optimization in a massive, overlooked space with deeply underutilized data.

Radar Labs is a geo-location developer tool platform handling over 1 billion API calls per day. They build geospatial technology including a custom Rust-based database, precise indoor location services, and location data visualization tools.

Phonely is building a voice AI platform for businesses that makes it easy to build, tune, and operate real-time voice agents. They provide systems that drive live voice conversations in production using LLMs and async Python microservices.

FUTO is an organization dedicated to developing technologies that frustrate centralization and industry consolidation through in-house engineering, investments, grants, and public education. They are currently building a cloud platform for Immich, a self-hostable photo and video backup solution with end-to-end encryption.

Apple is building backend transparency services that ensure the integrity of high-profile features like iMessage and Private Cloud Compute. The role focuses on building sophisticated distributed systems at the intersection of privacy, scalability, and end-user functionality that impact billions of users.

Fusionbox is a software engineering consultancy that builds enterprise software and open sources client code. They maintain popular libraries, contribute to Django core, and sponsor Python/Django community events.

deepset is the maker of Haystack and builds production-ready AI systems for companies. They specialize in deploying LLM applications, RAG systems, and AI agents that run reliably in production environments.

Atomic Tessellator simulates materials at the atomic level for aerospace, defence, nuclear fusion, and advanced polymers. They are the first to scale MLIPs across GPUs and are currently patenting their first new material.

AMD is building Wave, a high-performance GPU programming language and compiler for machine learning workloads that combines a Python-embedded DSL with an MLIR-based compiler stack. The role focuses on owning end-to-end performance of Wave's GPU kernels through low-level optimization and compiler development.

Stellar Science is a small scientific software development company that develops custom scientific and engineering analysis applications in domains including space situational awareness, image simulation, AI/ML, computer vision, high performance computing, and more. They emphasize high quality code and lightweight processes with no CRUD applications.

compensation: Competitive Base Salary plus Pre-IPO Equity
summary: Findigs is transforming the rental experience by building high-scale applications that streamline renting for millions, making it fairer, stress-free, and more convenient. The company uses a modern tech stack and fosters a collaborative culture with high ownership and autonomy for engineers.

Forge Sports is developing a new generation of B2B sports trading technology. They are hiring their first engineers to work with the founding engineer on building highly performant and reliable services.

A private applied research lab bridging computer science and structural mathematics, focusing on composability, learning, universality, and complexity with an emphasis on building systems rather than publishing. The lab takes an unconventional approach to reworking foundational abstractions when standard methods fail to compose.

Graphite builds tools to help high-performing engineering teams run faster, cleaner code reviews and is joining Cursor to bring together best-in-class tools for creating, reviewing, and merging code in the age of AI.
Hipcamp is a marketplace platform that connects people with outdoor camping experiences. They build product experiences that help users discover and book outdoor accommodations.

TextQL is building an agentic data lakehouse that enables AI agents to find trustworthy answers from messy enterprise data without configuring schemas or moving data. The company aims to drive the unit cost of data-driven decisions down to zero.

Uncountable provides a SaaS solution that accelerates R&D for industrial scientists across materials, chemicals, and life sciences organizations, helping customers get products to market in half the time. Founded by MIT and Stanford engineers, the company has been profitable since 2016 and recently doubled in size from 50 to 100 employees.

job_titles: Senior Software Engineer - Backend, Distributed Systems
summary: Smarkets is a betting exchange for sports and political trading that has handled over £37 billion in volume since 2010. Their mission is to fix the betting industry with the best products and best prices.
DeepL is building intelligent, trusted AI for language and beyond, offering translation and language technology solutions.

Adalat AI is transforming India's judicial system with cutting-edge AI technology, providing courtroom workflow solutions from transcription to summarization. Deployed across 10 states including the Delhi High Court, the platform is backed by global foundations and aims to help resolve India's court backlog and improve access to justice.

Arizona Optical Metrology (AOM) applies decades of optical metrology experience to demanding applications including commercial space telescopes, extreme precision optics for EUV lithography, and next-generation consumer electronics. They are developing computer vision based advanced metrology systems for high-precision optical measurement.

Lago is the leading open-source billing platform that empowers businesses to build flexible pricing models and scale with confidence. The company has raised over $22 million from top-tier investors including Y Combinator and FirstMark.

Artemis is a stealth AI-security startup with $15M in seed funding. They are building security detection solutions that customers use daily, with a focus on end-to-end product development from design to production.

compensation: $200k–$400k base (SF Forward Deployed), £150k–£300k base (London Forward Deployed/Platform), OTE $280k–$400k (Sales)
summary: Meticulous AI is building the world's first fully autonomous and exhaustive testing platform for frontend codebases that replays real user sessions against every pull request to catch regressions before they ship. Customers include Dropbox, Notion, Wiz, Wealthsimple, and LaunchDarkly.

FreightRoll is an AI-first logistics technology startup building production services with a lean, remote-first engineering team. They focus on extreme ownership and direct collaboration between engineers and customers.
Beautiful.ai is a Series B SaaS B2B presentation software company with $16M in funding operating in the AI industry. They provide presentation software solutions for business clients.

AIRMO is a European climate-tech company using space and airborne technologies to monitor greenhouse gas emissions globally. They are building a global monitoring system from air to space, helping energy companies, governments, and investors take real action on climate impact.

Realm.fun is a game server hosting platform that makes it simple to spin up Minecraft, Valheim, Palworld, and 25+ other game servers in seconds. They describe themselves as 'Vercel for game servers' and are a bootstrapped, profitable company.

Proton is a bootstrapped and profitable scale-up company focused on privacy and productivity tools. They are developing a new Rust-based client architecture for their Proton Mail desktop applications.

MONUMENTAL builds autonomous robots that construct buildings, currently developing and manufacturing autonomous bricklaying systems that are already operating on construction sites throughout the Netherlands. They are developing Atrium, an operating system for robotics that manages their fleet of construction robots.

compensation: $80k–$120k USD base + monthly bonus (10% of net revenue shared with employees)
summary: Charted Sea is a bootstrapped SaaS company that helps customers scrape complex e-commerce platforms like Shopee in Southeast Asia. They focus on solving hard technical problems including anti-bot detection, browser automation, fingerprinting, and captcha solving.
YakitOfisi builds software for the fuel and energy sector. They develop deterministic systems that run in production managing real-world operations in the energy industry.

compensation: $100k-$140k depending on experience, Stock options (0.5% - 1.5%), unlimited PTO
summary: PrairieLearn is an open-source assessment platform used by major universities across the US for mastery-based learning and large-scale exams. They are a small, profitable, bootstrapped company with high user retention and rapid growth through word of mouth.

Evercred is a Pre-A stage startup building AI agents that reduce physician credentialing from 90 days to 14 days in the $50B healthcare market. They are developing agent orchestration and monitoring infrastructure to scale verification processes from zero to thousands monthly.

Stream provides high-scale video SFU, chat API, moderation, and feeds infrastructure serving major apps like Strava, Nextdoor, Patreon, and Midjourney. They operate an edge network of servers globally and offer a 10-week onboarding program to train engineers in Go and scaling.
This is not a job posting but rather a promotional comment for a search tool (nthesis.ai) that helps users search and chat with Hacker News 'Who is hiring' posts.

Bookarang (part of NBD Biblion) uses AI to build book recommendation technology for retailers and libraries, providing personalized recommendations based on book content and reader preferences rather than popularity. They serve schools and libraries nationwide with their innovative recommendation platform.

Found is building next-generation financial tooling for small business owners, offering an all-in-one solution that combines banking, bookkeeping, taxes, and payments. Their platform helps users save time, reduce stress, and manage money more effectively so they can focus on running their business.

Prezly runs a platform that handles story publishing, media delivery and newsroom workflows for hundreds of organizations, serving millions of readers monthly. They are a profitable, remote-first company focused on high-traffic systems and modern development practices.

Nango is a YC-backed developer infrastructure company and the leading provider of API access for agents and apps, enabling AI applications to connect to the real world through integrations. The company serves over 250 paying customers including Replit, Mercor, and Exa, and is a multi-million ARR company.

job_titles: Senior Web Security Engineer, Browser Platform
summary: DuckDuckGo is a privacy-focused search engine and browser company on a mission to raise the standard of trust online. The company has scaled to over 300 people with fully-remote positions.

Cloudflare is building a new Data Platform that provides streaming ingest and processing, managed Iceberg catalogs, and a distributed query engine built on R2 and the Cloudflare Edge. The platform makes it easy for customers to build data lakes.

Doubling is an early-stage venture building a mission-driven consumer mobile product in the health and wellness space. They are creating a platform from the ground up with a focus on 0-to-1 product development.

Rasm Labs is a small software studio building SaaS products and custom systems with a lean engineering-focused approach. They operate without agency overhead or PM layers, allowing engineers to ship quality software directly.

Arcol is building a web-native, fully collaborative 3D design tool that modernizes the architectural design experience for teams of all sizes. They are creating the future of building design with a focus on collaborative, fast, and intuitive workflows.

Obie is an insurtech company building modern software and tooling for the heavily regulated insurance industry. They focus on customer-facing products and internal platforms that handle complex workflows, partner constraints, and real-world edge cases.

Blackshark AI builds geospatial AI infrastructure that enables analysts to train custom object and change detection models on satellite/aerial/drone imagery and reconstruct 3D terrain. They process trillions of pixels through distributed systems serving defense, intelligence, and local government customers.

job_titles: Senior Software Engineer: Network layer communication optimizations
Senior Software Engineer: GPU porting / RDMA / NCCL / NIXL layer development
summary: BitRipple is a deep-tech company building next generation network communication layers for AI, optimizing GPU idle time during LLM training with accelerated RDMA communication across clusters. They also service networking-related industries including mobility, satellite, aerospace, atmospheric optical, VPN, SD-WAN and defense.

job_titles: Founding Technical Product Manager - AI Platform
summary: Memorang is building the AI stack for education, combining knowledge graphs, agents, and apps to help enterprises build curricula and learning products at scale. They've powered 200MM+ assessments for credentialing organizations and publishers across aviation, healthcare, and other industries.

PostHog equips developers to build successful products by combining product analytics, feature flags, session replay, a data warehouse, CDP and many more tools. The company operates with high autonomy and transparency, maintaining a public handbook and compensation calculator.
MapTiler builds mapping infrastructure and rendering engines for hundreds of millions of users, currently developing a new WebGPU SDK for 3D geospatial visualization.

Moyai is an AI-powered agent monitoring tool for AI engineers looking to catch agent failures in production. The company is backed by well-known European VCs (SpeedInvest + Galion.exe) and has a technical founding team with relevant industry experience.

Songscription trains state-of-the-art AI models to automate music transcription, enabling musicians to learn any song on any instrument at any difficulty level. The company recently raised $5M in funding to build out their consumer product at the intersection of music, AI, and education.

Rover is the world's largest online marketplace for pet care, connecting millions of pet parents with trusted sitters and walkers. The company is building a global platform that combines technology, community, and love for animals with offices in Seattle, Barcelona, and beyond.

CASUS is rebuilding the core tool stack of the legal industry from the ground up, replacing fragmented tools and manual workflows with AI-first solutions. They are modernizing legal workflows including document reviews, templates, and compliance processes for the modern era.

PlantingSpace is building an AI system for analysts and scientists based on a fundamentally new approach to reasoning and knowledge representation that composes algorithms symbolically and performs probabilistic computations. They are developing applications for analysis and research in domains such as Finance, Strategy Consulting, and Engineering.

Halfpricesoft is a profitable, bootstrapped company that has dominated the small business payroll and tax compliance space for 20 years with thousands of customers. They are transitioning their legacy solutions into a modern, cloud-native suite and seeking a Founding Engineer to lead this technical transformation.

Splash Tech is a UK-based free-to-play gaming company with a distributed EU team that is scaling their platform after recent success. They are looking for product-focused engineers who can work across the full development cycle from idea to production.

Jurata is a LegalTech startup building an online one-stop shop for legal, accounting, and tax services. They help thousands of SMEs get fast, affordable access to professional support with a heavy focus on automation and AI.

SIG is a global quantitative trading firm that trades all listed financial products and asset classes, handling millions of transactions on exchanges worldwide every day. The company uses an entrepreneurial mindset and rigorous analytical approach to decision making as one of the largest proprietary trading firms in the world.

CVector builds software to bring real-time economic optimization and AI prediction to energy and manufacturing plants. They integrate real-time data visualization and analytics to help power generation stations, chemical plants, and other critical infrastructure make informed decisions in rapidly changing environments.

Rinse provides dry cleaning and laundry delivery services to customers in twelve metropolitan areas across the US and Canada. The company has sophisticated logistics optimization software and has been operating for over a decade with stable growth.

Immunera builds blood tests that use gene sequencing and machine learning to help patients with autoimmune disease. The company spun out of Stanford research and partners with hospitals to generate training data for biological sequence models.

Tenzir is building an open-core security data pipeline for the AI era that empowers defenders to collect, shape, and route security telemetry at scale. The company uses C++23/26 and Apache Arrow for the core engine with a modern TypeScript platform layer.

Veho is a package shipping and logistics company that operates distributed systems both in AWS and the physical world. They handle large-scale package delivery operations with complex technical challenges.

Axle Energy builds software to run decarbonised electricity grids, controlling hundreds of thousands of energy assets across the UK and Europe to monetise demand flexibility in electricity markets. The company is backed by Accel and focused on decarbonising the energy grid.

Midpage catalogs the world's legal data, currently covering US case law and providing data services to law firms, legal technology platforms, and AI companies through their webapp, API, MCP, and custom data services. They are the only vendor openly selling this data in the US with comprehensive citation linkages and a citator system.

Comper makes software landscapes understandable and explorable through a zoom-to-code canvas that shows data from all git repos in a company, with LLMs extracting architecture. They provide clarity for re-orgs, onboarding, and explaining tech stacks, aiming to do for large org codebases what Figma did for design.

Hack Club is a nonprofit where thousands of teenagers ship real projects (games, hardware, websites, apps) and receive free stuff in return, operating with radical trust and transparency across 140 countries. The organization runs You Ship We Ship programs that process thousands of teen projects monthly.

Neo.Tax automates enterprise accounting and tax with AI, helping companies like Notion, Mercury, Brex, and Whoop calculate R&D tax credits and capitalize software costs in hours instead of weeks. They process millions of records from various systems including Jira, GitHub, payroll systems, and accounting software.

Charge Robotics is a YC-backed, Series-A startup building robots that automate the construction of large-scale solar farms. They are developing mobile solar factories to help accelerate the transition to renewable energy generation.

Doowii is building an AI operating layer for education analytics that connects institutional systems (SIS/LMS/CRM) and enables non-technical teams to ask questions, explore data, and take action through integrated workflows. The platform features highly customized data ontology and AI-first product experiences.
Tailscale is modernizing the way devices and services connect together by building a connectivity platform. The company is rapidly growing across engineering, sales, and developer relations.
PMG builds large-scale marketing technology that makes data more transparent to clients by removing the blackbox nature of digital marketing from a data perspective.
Neurotone is revolutionizing auditory training with AI, helping people with hearing disabilities maximize their hearing aids through clinically grounded mobile products.
Peregrine is transforming the way organizations engage with their data, making it easily accessible and immediately actionable for those who need it, when they need it most.

Atomscale is building AI to improve atomic-scale materials manufacturing, helping translate new materials into technologies and products by enabling scalable production beyond R&D. They work on high-throughput data processing, complex visualization, and hardware integrations to unlock new technologies addressing pressing challenges.

RepSpark is the top SaaS B2B wholesale e-commerce platform for brands in apparel, footwear, and accessories. They enable businesses like golf courses across North America and Europe to purchase from brands like Titleist, Peter Millar, and Kjus.

Count is a collaborative data analytics platform that combines SQL, Python, and low-code query cells with visualizations on an infinite real-time canvas. The company has built a custom WebGL rendering engine and distributed compute engine based on DuckDB that dynamically shifts execution between browser and server.

Dragonfly is an early-stage startup at the intersection of system design, cloud infrastructure, and AI, enabling companies to adopt the latest in GenAI including agentic frameworks. Backed by Tier 1 VCs, they've recently launched publicly and are partnering with 20+ global brands.

Replica builds software to help cities, transit agencies, and state departments of transportation make better decisions by processing massive mobility datasets to inform planning and policy about how people move throughout the built environment.

EggAI is a small boutique consultancy specializing in enterprise AI solutions. They work with highly skilled remote engineers and transformation practitioners to design and implement backend services, event-driven architectures, and AI-powered solutions for enterprises.

Speakeasy builds developer experience tools including an API platform for generating and maintaining SDKs, Terraform Providers and CLIs using OpenAPI, and an MCP Platform for distributing product capabilities to coding agents. They are a team of senior developers focused on solving hard technical problems with much of their work being open source.

Jurisphere builds an enterprise Legal AI platform used by top law firms in India and the US. They are hiring their first SRE/Platform Engineer to own production reliability and serve as the infrastructure point-of-contact for enterprise clients.

AIDAR builds AI-powered tools for artist discovery, helping music professionals find emerging artists that fit their taste and vision. They are a small, focused team with a real product and paying users.

Cosuno is a fast-growing tech startup reshaping the construction industry with a digital platform for procurement. They use AI to analyze millions of price points, helping construction companies create bids based on real market data.
Sells is a middle-market M&A advisory firm building internal software, automation, and integrations to improve deal management, document handling, and workflows.

Strobe is building a distributed, software-defined power plant that enables buildings, batteries, EVs, and on-site generation to buy and sell power in real time. The company combines cloud control plane, embedded hardware, and energy market systems.

Coveo builds AI-powered systems that bring hyper-personalization to enterprise experiences including e-commerce, customer service, and workplace tools. Their platform helps users find what they need through search, recommendations, product discovery, and Generative AI.

Fanvue is a fast-growing creator monetisation platform that is AI-powered and creator-first, with Series A funding, $100M+ ARR, and triple-digit YoY growth. The platform supports hundreds of thousands of creators and millions of fans.

Annex Risk provides digital infrastructure for homeowners insurance transactions, enabling insurance agents to quote and bind policies in 90 seconds versus the current multi-day process. The company grew 4x in 2025 with less than $1.5m in funding and is scaling its engineering team to support continued growth.

Sage builds hardware and software systems to improve elder care, with their products used by thousands across the country. The company is focused on creating technology solutions that directly improve people's lives in the elder care space.

Stainless builds the platform for high-quality, easy-to-use APIs, generating code used by major companies like OpenAI, Anthropic, and Cloudflare. They are a ~3 year old company with ~60 people, strong revenue, and backing from Sequoia and a16z.

Nomi.ai builds AI companions that form deeply meaningful, humanlike relationships and immersive roleplaying experiences, serving over a million users growing at ~8% month-over-month. The company focuses on creating AI that helps users with personal growth, relationships, and mental health support.

Apple is seeking a Full-Stack Software Engineer to design and build applications for internal machine learning researchers. The role involves collaborating with data collection, data processing, and ML & product engineers to create next-generation Apple products.

Cloudflare operates a Developer Platform that enables developers to deploy applications globally in seconds using their V8 isolate-based runtime (Workers). They are building products including serverless containers, AI agents, and developer tools for deploying JavaScript, TypeScript, Rust, and Python applications.

Goody is building a gifting product that businesses use to recognize employees, retain customers, and accelerate sales. Their product is used by companies like Google, Stripe, Anthropic, Meta, NBCUniversal, and Notion, and they offer a developer API for commerce.

Source builds the data and trust layer for edge AI, mobile apps, and critical software to run on devices, vehicles, and field hardware with reliable offline-first capabilities. They enable developers to build systems that work correctly even when connectivity is poor or the cloud is unavailable.

Tower is a Python-native serverless platform built on Apache Iceberg that provides powerful ETL and Lakehouse management tools. The platform helps data teams focus on extracting value from their data rather than managing infrastructure, allowing companies to choose the best engine for each job while maintaining full data ownership.

Surge AI operates the largest human data platform in the industry, powering AI teams at top AI labs by building human infrastructure for next-generation models. They focus on RL environments and agentic workflows to help clients ship agents that interact with the world.

CrazyGames is a self-funded, profitable browser games platform reaching 50 million people per month. They leverage modern web technologies like WebGPU and WebAssembly to deliver high-quality 3D gaming experiences without downloads or apps.

Kato is building a compliance-first AI servicing platform for the $24B lending market, with their first product being a Voice AI agent that handles loan servicing calls for major fintechs. They've built a regulatory rules system with an AI decision engine on top, treating compliance as a core feature rather than an afterthought.
Microsoft Research Health Futures is a research division at Microsoft focused on healthcare and health technology innovations. The team is working on advancing health-related research and solutions.

Discord is a large-scale communication platform serving 200M+ users. The company builds distributed database systems and data platform services to handle performance, reliability, and scalability challenges.

Modash is an end-to-end influencer marketing platform for Shopify stores that helps creators earn a living. The company has a 70+ person team, raised €11M in Series A funding, and has paid out millions to creators to date.

Enveritas is a 501(c)(3) nonprofit working on sustainability issues facing smallholder coffee farmers. They collect field data in 25+ countries and build systems for analyzing risks in coffee supply chains, including EUDR-related deforestation checks.

AllSpice.io is a version control and collaboration platform for hardware design, similar to GitHub but specifically for PCB and schematic design. The company brings modern software development workflows including version control, automation, collaboration, and AI to the hardware engineering world.

eventfirst is applying AI to organize corporate events. They are currently focused on building tooling that enables capturing domain knowledge from experts to streamline prompt creation and evaluation.

compensation: Top of the Romanian market compensation (salary and equity)
summary: Crowdstrike builds a data lake that stores hundreds of trillions of events, ingesting close to 100 million messages per second. The role involves contributing to the full spectrum of data systems including modeling, processing, and storage.

Atria Health is a healthcare technology company focused on shifting from reactive sick care to preventative, precision healthcare. They are doubling their engineering team with 11 roles across various engineering disciplines.

Float is building AI-native capital markets infrastructure to tackle decades-old inefficiencies in financial institutions. Based in SoHo, New York and backed by top-tier venture investors, they create technology that enables seamless interaction and intelligent automation in financial markets.

Puma.tech builds privacy-focused products including Puma Browser (iOS & Android) with built-in LLMs & Wallets, and PumaAI app for Mac that allows users to pick different model providers with local-first options for data privacy. The company is backed by notable investors from crypto and AI including Protocol Labs, Ripple, Solana, NEAR Protocol, and Snowflake CEO.

Pushscroll is a mobile app that makes users do push-ups before opening addictive apps, verified through camera pose detection, with the goal of replacing doomscrolling with exercise. The company is bootstrapped, profitable, and has over 500k downloads.

Northstar Security is a seed-stage cybersecurity startup building an agentic AI platform that helps security teams understand and defend complex environments through a semantic layer that integrates fragmented security and IT tools. The platform enables AI-native reasoning over a company's security posture.

Kinelo builds a human+AI orchestration platform that manages hybrid teams of humans and AI working together. Their first product helps software engineering teams deliver more efficiently by assisting in coordination and engineering management through a foundational layer that ingests data, knowledge, and process across communications and systems.

ToucanTix is a ticketing platform serving major theme parks, zoos, and experience venues across Germany and the USA. They are a spin-off from COMBASE AG focusing on leisure and culture ticketing, visitor management, and capacity control.

Silkline is an AI-first procurement platform for aerospace, defense, and nuclear manufacturing that modernizes hardware supply chains by replacing spreadsheets, email, and PDFs with automated RFQ management, real-time order tracking, and ITAR-compliant supplier management. The company helps customers like Astranis, K2 Space, and Machina Labs manage millions in orders and avoid costly production delays.

Procore builds the most widely used construction management platform in the world, connecting every stakeholder on construction projects worth hundreds of billions of dollars annually. The company is publicly traded on NYSE under ticker PCOR.

Evervault builds data security products using applied cryptography to protect sensitive data in payments, banking, and healthcare. They use encryption and confidential computing to help companies minimize compliance headaches and prevent data breaches.

Guided Clinical Solutions is building a medication safety platform for use in operating rooms. They provide a regulated healthcare SaaS product focused on improving medication safety during surgical procedures.

ChainSecurity is a cybersecurity company specializing in blockchain and cryptocurrency security, providing security audits and services to blockchain companies, DeFi projects, banks, and industrial consortia. They are trusted by 100+ blockchain companies to secure complex systems handling billions in the open financial system.

Mozart AI is a Digital Audio Workstation (DAW) with built-in AI Co-Production that empowers hybrid musicians by combining human creativity with AI assistance. The company has 80k+ beta users and is a seed-stage startup focused on transforming music creation.
Encube Technologies builds collaborative, real-time software for manufacturing, focusing on browser-based 3D rendering, CAD compute algorithms, and real-time multi-user collaboration features.

Loki Robotics is an early-stage startup developing teleoperated and autonomous robots for contact-based indoor cleaning and facility management. They have already deployed robots and are transitioning from prototype to product.

compensation: Market with mix of base + bonus + meaningful equity
summary: DrSwarm is building AI-driven workflow automation for healthcare clinics and health systems, focusing on scheduling, RCM/billing workflows, and patient operations. This is a 0→1 founding role to ship fast, talk to customers, and own systems end-to-end.

StorPool builds high-performance data storage software for modern clouds, delivering sub-100 microsecond latency, 113M+ IOPS per cluster, and 99.999% availability. The company is profitable, self-funded, and focuses on systems-level programming for storage infrastructure.

FetLife is the largest kinky social network with over 12 million members, experiencing 100% word-of-mouth growth and handling billions of daily requests. The platform connects members of the kink community through a large-scale social networking application.

Healthesystems is a specialty provider of innovative medical cost management solutions for the workers' compensation industry, offering Pharmacy Benefit Management (PBM), Clinical Review Services, and Ancillary Benefits Management (ABM) programs.

Aqora is building a hub for quantum computing that organizes global quantum hackathons and competitions while hosting quantum datasets and algorithms. They have partnered with major industry players and are generating six-figure revenues with their live MVP platform.

Unit is building GTV, a new video platform that can autonomously produce high-quality, personalized content. The team is from Instagram, TikTok, and NVIDIA, backed by Khosla Ventures and Air Street Capital.

Knit Health is building a clinical foundation model to improve healthcare delivery by combining AI systems engineering with clinical domain expertise. They work with multiple large US health systems to develop reliable models and workflows that can be integrated into provider environments.

Carta connects founders, investors, and limited partners through world-class software purpose-built for everyone in venture capital, private equity and private credit. They focus on frontend platform infrastructure, design systems, and developer experience.

ML6 is a Machine Learning consulting company that builds end-to-end ML solutions for major European clients. They apply the latest AI research to keep clients at the forefront of innovation, working on projects ranging from LLM-powered customer support to cloud-based data lakes and sensor-based quality control.
NetToolKit offers a variety of services including geocoding, map tiles, and CAPTCHA solutions.

DoShare Labs is a technology company hiring across multiple roles including technical, infrastructure, design, customer support, and marketing positions. The company operates in India and the United States with remote work options available.

JustPark is a parking platform that offers B2B solutions for destinations and B2C services for drivers, simplifying the entire parking experience by enabling drivers to find, book, and pay for parking while empowering partners to deliver exceptional parking experiences.

Lightning AI, creators of PyTorch Lightning, is building the OS for AI with a unified platform to build, train, and deploy models and applications without infrastructure complexity. They enable developers to deploy AI applications at scale through production systems and distributed architectures.

Starbridge is building an AI platform that turns large-scale public and enterprise data into reliable sales insights. They are an early-stage company moving fast and building from zero to one with huge ownership and product impact opportunities.

Maiven is a software platform automating home decarbonization, working with large utility customers across multiple states. They are a venture-backed, mission-driven startup focused on energy efficiency and building science.

Unto Labs is developing the Thru Layer-1 blockchain with $14.4 million in funding, founded by Jump Crypto alumni and Solana core contributors. They are building a RISC-V based blockchain runtime that allows developers to write smart contracts in any LLVM-compatible programming language for improved scalability, performance, and usability.

Ezra is a venture-backed startup building a platform at the intersection of sustainable finance and artificial intelligence to accelerate capital deployment into climate solutions and world-positive investments.

WireScreen is a Sequoia-backed Series A startup building an open source intelligence platform for navigating global supply chains and China-related risk. They surface corporate networks, relationships, and financial ties to support national security, compliance, and regulatory oversight through a 50m+ entity knowledge-graph with 200m+ relationships.

Coram AI is building an AI-powered video security platform that helps enterprises proactively detect and respond to real-world incidents. They work with large-scale video data, real-time systems, and applied computer vision.

OmniAI is building AI-powered infrastructure for small-business lending, helping banks and fintechs automate document collection, financial modeling, public-record research, and borrower communication.
Lantern builds AI-powered revenue intelligence using autonomous agents that turn cold outreach into warm conversations by detecting buying signals and prioritizing opportunities for B2B sales teams.

Hearst is an established multi-national corporation with a portfolio spanning media brands, healthcare, transportation, and financial services. They are building out generative AI use cases across their businesses with a team that operates like a well-funded early stage startup focused on radical business transformation using AI technology.
ELDRICK is the world's #1 AI golf club fitter, trained on 80,000 real club fittings, building an AI-powered golf fitting platform to replace guesswork and brand bias in equipment recommendations.
Mondrio is building an AI-powered monetization operating system to solve B2B SaaS pricing challenges. They are a pre-seed, 4-person team shipping to live customers with an AI-native workflow.

Trunk is an a16z-funded Series A dev tools startup building a CI Reliability Platform that helps engineering teams ship code faster by addressing merge conflicts, flaky tests, and code quality issues. Their products include Merge Queue and Flaky Tests detection to help teams at companies like Google X, Zillow, and Brex improve development productivity.

GrackerAI builds infrastructure for Answer Engine Optimization (AEO) and Generative Engine Optimization (GEO), helping brands track AI visibility scores and automate high-intent content creation for AI assistants like ChatGPT, Perplexity, and Gemini.

Caspian Trade simplifies global trade compliance and helps importers navigate duty drawback—a tax recovery process that recovers unclaimed refunds. Their platform uses AI/ML to transform messy trade data into actionable insights, helping businesses recover from an estimated $10B in unclaimed refunds annually.

Notable Health builds intelligent automation and AI-powered platforms to transform healthcare workflows, eliminating manual tasks and streamlining operations across health systems. Their technology enables clinicians and staff to focus more on patient care by automating administrative processes.

Cogram is an AI platform for the architecture, engineering, and construction industry that automates project administration tasks such as RFIs, submittals, email filing, field notes, meeting minutes, and reporting. The company is backed by Y Combinator and Initialized, with world-leading architecture and engineering firms adopting their platform at scale.

L2 Labs is an AI research lab pursuing research at the intersection of database systems and AI, driven by real-world challenges from enterprise partners. Backed by Cornell University, Focal VC, and New York University, they are building a new kind of applied AI research lab.

Vantage is an a16z-backed FinOps/Cloud Cost Management platform that helps over 15,000 organizations globally manage their infrastructure costs. The company is building AI/Agent workflows to auto-remediate cost-related issues for customers.

Rivet is an AI marketing platform that helps brands and creators like Chance the Rapper, Major Lazer, and John Legend boost D2C revenue by growing their communities and powering direct-to-fan marketing and sales across all channels. The company is pre-seed, VC-backed, and has gone from pre-revenue to profitable in the past 2 years.

Beacon AI builds intelligent systems that make aviation safer and more autonomous, developing human-machine collaboration technology for cockpits. The company has completed multiple DoD programs and deploys code in real-world aviation environments.

Tiger Data (formerly Timescale) provides the fastest PostgreSQL database optimized for time-series data, real-time analytics, agentic applications, and high-ingest operational systems. The company serves over 2,000 companies with their evolved PostgreSQL technology for modern workloads.
Mason is building an AI agent to manage single family rental properties across the United States. They currently manage approximately 4,000 homes and are growing quickly.
Zigment is a customer journey platform that makes it simple to build AI agents for enterprises. They focus on building reliable and scalable AI systems for enterprise customers.

VIVA Finance is a fintech startup that offers unsecured personal loans to underserved customers at rates less than 1/3 of traditional options, underwriting based on employment history with repayments through voluntary paycheck deductions. The company has been profitable since mid-2024 and is expanding into automobile refinancing and credit builder accounts.

Bidaya AI is an early-stage VC-backed startup automating RFPs in the AEC (Architecture, Engineering, Construction) industry. They are building an online platform with Microsoft Word integration to help firms find and win more work while serving as their knowledge management hub for business development.

compensation: Director of Engineering: $225k, Engineering Manager: $195k, Senior Engineer: $170k
summary: EnergyHub builds software platforms that enable millions of smart device owners to partner with utilities to create virtual power plants (VPPs) that help decarbonize the electric grid. They control over 2.5 million devices across the US, managing over 4 gigawatts of electrical load for utilities serving 1/3rd of the US population.

Rely is an AI-native platform reinventing due diligence and underwriting for multifamily real estate. The platform processes over 2M pages of data monthly and is used by some of the largest operators in the industry.

BuildForever is a small team of creative builders from ex-OpenAI and Pinterest crafting consumer products that feel personal, magical, and deeply human. They focus on building lovingly made, purposeful, and joyful consumer software with heart, emotion, and taste.

Tramcase builds AI tools that help high-volume law firms manage their caseloads more efficiently. Their first product is an AI assistant that transcribes and classifies inbound calls, with expansion into case tracking, follow-ups, and full workflow automation.

Securikett is a family-owned company specializing in product protection and anti-counterfeiting solutions. They are building a SaaS platform that extends physical product protection into the digital world, replacing legacy systems.

HelloData is an automated market analysis platform for multifamily real estate that processes daily data from hundreds of thousands of property websites to power pricing intelligence and investment decisions. N26 is a digital banking platform that has reimagined banking for today's digital world, eliminating physical branches and paperwork for an elegant digital experience. Headquartered in Berlin with offices across Europe, they have a 1,500-strong team of more than 80 nationalities building a global banking platform.

Nova Credit is building a unified platform for credit and financial data to power financial inclusion globally. Their mission is to unlock economic opportunities for consumers historically excluded from traditional credit systems by transforming diverse data into actionable risk insights.

A bootstrapped stealth startup building an AI companion product, focused on the belief that AI dating will become mainstream within 10 years. Currently seeking help with user interviews to define and iterate their MVP.
